text: Not to be confused with Parietal eye. The third eye is spiritual concept. The third (or inner) eye is an invisible eye located on the forehead. It symbolizes a state of enlightenment. In India, it refers to chakra. It also related to visions, precognition, clairvoyance, and out-of-body experiences. Indian gods were usually depicted with a third eye. == References == # Cavendish (1994), p. 2606. # Leadbeater (1994), p. 79. # Saraswati (2001), p. [page needed]. # Dhillon, Singh & Dua (2009). # Jefferson (1982), ch. 4. Category:Spirituality
title: Third eye
